text: Hello! Does anyone know if there is a way to subscribe again a contact on HubSpot via API? Whenever I try to subscribe again it returns an error
No, the only way for a contact to re-subscribe is by going into an old email and clicking the "Manage preferences" link and resubscribe from there
Hello - new to HubSpot! Had a facebook pixel question not sure which channel to ask - asked in General and Devloper tools.
